channel.title: Hayday - News
channel.description: RSS wrapper of Hayday inbox News

item.title: Hay Day Events Week 25!
item.description:
Hay Day Events Week 25!

Hello farmers! Enjoy a new week of events while celebrating Hay Day's birthday! All events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each event by visiting our event board in the game.

Monday: Spin the Wheel (Vouchers)

Tuesday: Truck Event (2x XP)

Wednesday: Truck Event (2x Coins)

Thursday: Farm Visitor Event (Yard Sale)

Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (Duck Salon and Net Maker, 30%) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Town Visitor (2x XP) + Truck Event (2x Coins)

Sunday: Animal Feed Event (3 random types of animal feed produced 2x faster)

Have an amazing week!

item.title: Hay Day Events Week 26!
item.description:
Hay Day Events Week 26!

Hello farmers! We hope you have been enjoying the birthday celebrations, it's time for another week of events! All events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each event by visiting our event board in the game.

Monday: Spin the Wheel (Expansion Materials)

Tuesday: Truck Event (Vouchers)

Wednesday: Town Visitor Event (2x Coins)

Thursday: Farm Visitor Event (2x Coins)

Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (Lobster and Lures 30%) + 2x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Town Visitor (Expansion Materials)

Sunday: Truck Event (2x XP) + Fruit boost (3 random types of trees or bushes will produce twice as fast)

Have an amazing week!

item.title: Dairy News: start your collection here
Hay Day Events Week 27!
item.description:
Hay Day Events Week 27!

Hello farmers! Summer is in full swing now it's July, get ready for another month full of events! All events start at 8 AM UTC. Dive into the specifics of each event by visiting our event board in the game.

Monday: Spin the Wheel (Puzzle Pieces) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Tuesday: Truck Event (Expansion Materials) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Wednesday: Boat Event (Vouchers) + 3x Farm Pass Points

Thursday: Machine Boost (3 random machines produce at 2x speed)

Friday: Fishing Production Boost Event (All 20% Boost) + 2x Farm Pass Points

Saturday: Town Visitor (2x Coins)

Sunday: Trees/Bushes Time Percent (3 randomised bushes or trees produce fruits at 2x speed) + Truck Event (2x XP)

Have a great week!

Have a great week!

Monday: Spin the Wheel (Vouchers)

Tuesday: Town Visitor Event (Silo & Barn Materials)

Wednesday: Boat Event (2x Coins)

Thursday: Production Buildings - (20% boost for 3 buildings)

Friday: Fishing Event: Duck and Net maker 30%

Saturday: Town Visitor Event (Expansions)

Sunday: Crops Event (three random crops will yield 3 crops instead of the usual 2).

Have a productive week!

item.title: Visitor Milestone Info
item.description:
Green Game Jam Visitor Milestone

In Hay Day, nothing bad ever happens and every meal is a sustainable meal! We are joining Green Game Jam and inviting you to bring some of that sustainability to your real lives and share it with your loved ones.

Right now, our Farm Visitors are giving out extra Coins for all the vegetarian goodies you produce during the Task Event - and we're ready to give you even more rewards!

For the next 7 days, let's come together as a community to serve as many Farm Visitors as we can, earning extra rewards along the way.

Rewards:

  • 20 Million Farm Visitors Served: 2x Screws

  • 40 Million Farm Visitors Served: 2x Marker Stakes

  • 60 Million Farm Visitors Served: 10x Diamonds

  • 80 Million Farm Visitors Served: 1x Pumpkin Gnome

Keep an eye on your inbox to track our progress towards this milestone, and when it's time to collect your rewards, head over to the Shop. You'll find them waiting as free items, just a scroll past the Farm Pass offers.

Together, we can create a positive impact! Good luck!

Have a wonderful week!
